import React, { Fragment } from "react"; import { makeStyles } from "@material-ui/core/styles"; import Grid from "@material-ui/core/Grid"; import SelectEducation from "../components/SelectEducation"; import SelectMajor from "../components/SelectMajor"; import TextField from "@material-ui/core/TextField"; import Autocomplete from "@material-ui/lab/Autocomplete"; // สร้างstyle const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ formControl: { minWidth: 320, }, })); export default function SimpleSelect({ formProps: { register, errors }, data, setEducations, }) { const classes = useStyles(); const { educate } = data; const options = education.map((option) => { const firstLetter = option.education[0].toUpperCase(); return { firstLetter: /[0-9]/.test(firstLetter) ? "0-9" : firstLetter, ...option, }; }); return (

setEducations({ ...data, educate: value }) } options={options.sort( (ก, อ) => -อ.firstLetter.localeCompare(ก.firstLetter) )} groupBy={(option) => option.firstLetter} getOptionLabel={(option) => option.education} fullWidth id="auto-complete" autoComplete includeInputInList renderInput={(params) => ( )} /> setEducations({ ...data, majorName: value }) } options={options.sort( (ก, อ) => -อ.firstLetter.localeCompare(ก.firstLetter) )} groupBy={(option) => option.firstLetter} getOptionLabel={(option) => option.major} fullWidth id="auto-complete" autoComplete includeInputInList renderInput={(params) => ( )} />
